content_1: The Ministry of Health announced a confirmed case of H5N1 bird flu in a human on August 19. A 6-year-old girl from Kampong Cham Province developed symptoms on August 7, was admitted to Kantha Bopha Children Hospital in Phnom Penh on August 12, and died on August 14. There have been reports of poultry dying in her village and the girl had reportedly been exposed to sick poultry. This is the 18th case of human infection with H5N1 in Cambodia and the 16th fatality since the disease first broke out.
